description: doc: NetBSD is fully supported now

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

still need to wait for adg to ack that we plan to provide binary distribution
tarballs for NetBSD.

On 13 October 2012 20:19,  <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
> still need to wait for adg to ack that we plan to provide binary
> distribution
> tarballs for NetBSD.

Nobody raised this with me, apart from your CL (that I LGTM'd because
it was correct).

For NetBSD to be fully supported I need to have machines that are
maintained by Googlers from which to roll the binary distributions.
Benny - are you happy for me to use your machines for this?

Please hold off on submitting this CL until this is worked out.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b154a456c78c ***

doc: NetBSD is fully supported now

R=adg, bsiegert
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6660047

subject: code review 6660047: doc: NetBSD is fully supported now
